parks.name: SeaWorld Orlando
parks.subtitle: Your Guide to a Carb-Conscious Day by the Sea

menuItems.name: The Altitude Burger
menuItems.description: 1 lb fresh beef patty topped with bacon, cheddar cheese, and an onion ring, served with mozzarella sticks.

menuItems.name: Beyond Burger
menuItems.description: Plant-based Beyond patty served on a toasted bun with lettuce, tomato, and onion.

menuItems.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Wrap
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast with romaine lettuce and Caesar dressing in a flour tortilla.

menuItems.name: Blueberry Cobb Chicken Salad
menuItems.description: Mixed greens with grilled chicken, blueberries, bacon, egg, and cobb dressing.

menuItems.name: Tender Tower
menuItems.description: Hand-breaded chicken tenders over fries, topped with shredded cheddar-jack cheese, bacon bits, and chives.

menuItems.name: Orange Chicken with Fried Rice
menuItems.description: Crispy battered chicken tossed in sweet orange sauce, served with fried rice.

menuItems.name: Beef and Broccoli with Fried Rice
menuItems.description: Sliced beef and broccoli in savory sauce, served with fried rice.

menuItems.name: Vegetable Stir Fry with Fried Rice
menuItems.description: Wok-tossed mixed vegetables in a savory sauce, served over fried rice.

menuItems.name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
menuItems.description: Spaghetti pasta with meatballs in marinara sauce.

menuItems.name: Chicken Parmesan Sandwich
menuItems.description: Breaded chicken cutlet with marinara and melted cheese on a toasted roll.

menuItems.name: Bacon Queso Burger
menuItems.description: All-beef burger topped with bacon, queso, and pico de gallo, served with fries.

menuItems.name: Mini Street Tacos
menuItems.description: Three mini street tacos with your choice of protein, served with rice and beans.

menuItems.name: Lakeside Rice Bowl
menuItems.description: Signature rice bowl with your choice of protein, fresh toppings, and house sauce.

menuItems.name: Chicken Taco Salad
menuItems.description: Crispy tortilla bowl filled with seasoned chicken, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

menuItems.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description: Hand-breaded crispy chicken breast on a toasted bun with pickles and sauce.

menuItems.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken breast served on a toasted bun with lettuce and tomato.

menuItems.name: Fish and Chips
menuItems.description: Beer-battered fish fillets served with seasoned fries and tartar sauce.

menuItems.name: Crispy Buffalo Wings
menuItems.description: Fried chicken wings tossed in buffalo sauce, served with ranch or blue cheese.

menuItems.name: St. Louis Style Ribs
menuItems.description: Slow-smoked St. Louis style pork ribs with hickory wood BBQ glaze.

menuItems.name: Texas Brisket Platter
menuItems.description: Slow-smoked Texas-style beef brisket served with coleslaw and cornbread.

menuItems.name: Bacon Cheeseburger Pretzel
menuItems.description: Soft pretzel stuffed with bacon, beef, and melted cheese.

menuItems.name: Cinnamon Sugar Pretzel Nuggets
menuItems.description: Warm soft pretzel nuggets dusted with cinnamon sugar and served with icing.

menuItems.name: Hawaiian Grilled Chicken Tenders
menuItems.description: Grilled chicken tenders with a sweet Hawaiian-style glaze.

menuItems.name: Turkey Melt Grilled Cheese Sandwich
menuItems.description: Grilled cheese sandwich with sliced turkey and melted cheese on toasted bread.

menuItems.name: Flamecraft Signature Cocktail
menuItems.description: House-crafted specialty cocktail with a tropical twist, served lakeside.
